author: Ewan Palmer
title: Middle-aged Crowd Break COVID-19 Stay-at-Home Order to Watch Pink Floyd Cover Band, Chant 'F*** the Police' as Officers Arrive
description: Police said they had to disperse a group of 30 people aged 40 to 50 who gathered on a front lawn in Rumson, New Jersey.
content:
A New Jersey man has been charged after hosting a concert outside his home in violation of the state's ban on social gatherings amid the coronavirus outbreak.
John Maldjian, 54, of Rumson, has been charged with reckless endangerment, disorderly conduct and t… [+6041 chars]
